Message: Okay got it. For insight, availability will only show as far out as about mid/late March right now, until 60 day notices come in from current renters for later dates. And we won‚Äôt want to tour so early because you‚Äôd miss out on look and lease specials (applying within 48 hours of touring) if you tour soon and re-tour closer to your move date. Just keep these things in mind. I‚Äôll send a quick list shortly and then a final list of deals when we‚Äôre about 60 days from your move date. We‚Äôll aim to start touring late March/early April "
Notes: Best time to start an apartment search is about 60 days from moving. Most apartments in Texas require 60 day notice from renters to vacate. When 60 day notices are submitted is when a renters apartment will go back on the market for everyone to see.

 3rd month you pay $892.50 to them. Put $577.50 aside ($1470 - $892.50)

 For your two free months you put $1445 aside and when you start paying rent in month three you have $2890 ($1445 x 2) to pull from. You continue to pay $1445 per month and pull $290 per month from the ‚Äúpot‚Äù you put away the first 2 months.
